#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**Get Started with GCash**

- [How do I create a new GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005866623-How-do-I-create-a-new-GCash-account)
- [Create a GCash Jr account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/6026722650649-Create-a-GCash-Jr-account)
- [I can’t create or register for a GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30445523277337-I-can-t-create-or-register-for-a-GCash-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I'm trying to create a GCash account but it’s asking for an MPIN. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39913707773209-I-m-trying-to-create-a-GCash-account-but-it-s-asking-for-an-MPIN-What-should-I-do)
- [Is there a minimum maintaining balance required to use GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/37651205722777-Is-there-a-minimum-maintaining-balance-required-to-use-GCash)
- [There is another GCash account using my number. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30445589228057-There-is-another-GCash-account-using-my-number-What-do-I-do)
[See all 7 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657594-Get-Started-with-GCash)

**Logging in to GCash**

- [I can’t login to GCash because it says I have an “untrusted connection.” What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42096140355353-I-can-t-login-to-GCash-because-it-says-I-have-an-untrusted-connection-What-do-I-do)
- [Are there other ways to log in to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41329110227737-Are-there-other-ways-to-log-in-to-GCash)
- [I can't log in to my GCash account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006273543-I-can-t-log-in-to-my-GCash-account-What-do-I-do)
- [Account Secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005597526-Account-Secure)
- [I want to use GCash on another phone or device](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36302878095385-I-want-to-use-GCash-on-another-phone-or-device)
- [I lost the SIM or phone where my GCash account is registered](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006457043-I-lost-the-SIM-or-phone-where-my-GCash-account-is-registered)
[See all 11 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/38904293949721-Logging-in-to-GCash)

**Verify Your Account**

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [I don't have accepted IDs for GCash verification. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45574039056153-I-don-t-have-accepted-IDs-for-GCash-verification-What-do-I-do)
- [I’m having issues with using my ePhil ID (Paper type) or Digital National ID to verify my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45378359816089-I-m-having-issues-with-using-my-ePhil-ID-Paper-type-or-Digital-National-ID-to-verify-my-GCash-account)
- [Ano ang mga steps para makakuha ng Fully Verified na GCash Account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42822120412825-Ano-ang-mga-steps-para-makakuha-ng-Fully-Verified-na-GCash-Account)
- [How can I submit additional documents for my GCash Jr. verification?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42598618757913-How-can-I-submit-additional-documents-for-my-GCash-Jr-verification)
[See all 12 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657894-Verify-Your-Account)

**Account Security**

- [Parang na-scam ako sa GCash. Ano ang dapat gawin?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43503782056985-Parang-na-scam-ako-sa-GCash-Ano-ang-dapat-gawin)
- [Bakit na-hold ang GCash account ko?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43503536269849-Bakit-na-hold-ang-GCash-account-ko)
- [I forgot my GCash MPIN](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/28984195849625-I-forgot-my-GCash-MPIN)
- [I want to change my GCash MPIN](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35221433022361-I-want-to-change-my-GCash-MPIN)
- [Paano mag troubleshoot ng GCash App issues](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/42821679445657-Paano-mag-troubleshoot-ng-GCash-App-issues)
- [How to troubleshoot GCash app issues](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910877046937-How-to-troubleshoot-GCash-app-issues)
[See all 18 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657834-Account-Security)

**Manage Your Account**

- [I want to update my address or work information in GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45260364962329-I-want-to-update-my-address-or-work-information-in-GCash)
- [I want to update my GCash email address](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45259632531225-I-want-to-update-my-GCash-email-address)
- [I want to update my name or birthdate in my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034342914-I-want-to-update-my-name-or-birthdate-in-my-GCash-account)
- [I want to change my mobile number linked to my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-change-my-mobile-number-linked-to-my-GCash-account)
- [My GCash account is on hold. How can I access my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609-My-GCash-account-is-on-hold-How-can-I-access-my-account)
- [I was Fully Verified, why was my GCash account downgraded to a basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31782046693529-I-was-Fully-Verified-why-was-my-GCash-account-downgraded-to-a-basic-account)
[See all 15 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657754-Manage-Your-Account)

**Wallet & Transactions**

- [What are my GCash Wallet and Transaction Limits?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-What-are-my-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits)
- [How do I increase my GCash wallet and transaction limits?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900001210723-How-do-I-increase-my-GCash-wallet-and-transaction-limits)
- [My GCash wallet and transaction limits did not increase even after following the steps. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30314566439961-My-GCash-wallet-and-transaction-limits-did-not-increase-even-after-following-the-steps-What-do-I-do)
- [How do I view and download my GCash transaction history?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034155433-How-do-I-view-and-download-my-GCash-transaction-history)
- [Can I create multiple GCash accounts with different numbers?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4408383378457-Can-I-create-multiple-GCash-accounts-with-different-numbers)

**Manage Your App**

- [I did not receive my OTP for my GCash transaction/login](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19805310504985-I-did-not-receive-my-OTP-for-my-GCash-transaction-login)
- [How to activate and turn on location services on GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18446011153433-How-to-activate-and-turn-on-location-services-on-GCash)
